channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: e47c6f54-e4a2-4754-9501-8e0985b135e1
Display name: Azure AI Account Owner
Description: Grants full access to manage AI projects and accounts. Grants conditional assignment of the Azure AI User role to other user principles.
Link: https://management.azure.com/e47c6f54-e4a2-4754-9501-8e0985b135e1?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 5c227a58-cff3-4b51-9fa3-51bdafb6ca55
Display name: Secrets Store Extension Owner
Description: Read, create and modify secretsync and secretproviderclass objects. Register and deregister the provider from the subscription.
Link: https://management.azure.com/5c227a58-cff3-4b51-9fa3-51bdafb6ca55?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 53ca6127-db72-4b80-b1b0-d745d6d5456d
Display name: Azure AI User
Description: Grants reader access to AI projects, reader access to AI accounts, and data actions for an AI project.
Link: https://management.azure.com/53ca6127-db72-4b80-b1b0-d745d6d5456d?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: fc0c873f-45e9-4d0d-a7d1-585aab30c6ed
Display name: Azure Red Hat OpenShift Hosted Control Planes Control Plane Operator
Description: Enables the control plane operator to read resources necessary for OpenShift cluster.
Link: https://management.azure.com/fc0c873f-45e9-4d0d-a7d1-585aab30c6ed?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: c0ff367d-66d8-445e-917c-583feb0ef0d4
Display name: Azure Red Hat OpenShift Hosted Control Planes Service Managed Identity
Description: Azure Red Hat OpenShift Hosted Control Planes Service Managed Identity
Link: https://management.azure.com/c0ff367d-66d8-445e-917c-583feb0ef0d4?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: de2b316d-7a2c-4143-b4cd-c148f6a355a1
Display name: Azure Kubernetes Fleet Manager Hub Agent Role
Description: Grants read access to Azure network resources needed by Azure Kubernetes Fleet Manager.
Link: https://management.azure.com/de2b316d-7a2c-4143-b4cd-c148f6a355a1?api-version=2022-04-01
